item.title: Routing Static
item.description: Configuring static routing in MikroTik RouterOS is quite straightforward. Here’s how you can do it using the WinBox GUI: Login to your MikroTik router: Open the WinBox application, enter the IP address of your MikroTik router in the Connect To field, and click on Connect. Then enter your credentials to log in. Navigate to IP > Routes: On the left-hand side menu, go to IP and then Routes. Add a static route: Click on the “+” icon to add a new static route.

item.title: Video Tutorial
item.description: If You want to see the video tutorial on how to route static, here’s the video!
